None.Name: Outlaw Burst
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, unit uses its cannon to fire off a ball that deals 192 to enemies within a cone-shaped area, up to 288 in total. 25% of all damage dealt by this unit cannot be warded off with the help of damage reduction abilities because it is able to circumvent every buff or protective shield. Knocks back small and medium units.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.
